class pages.pages_case_1.seat_map_page.SeatMapPage(driver)

Bases: Common

AVAILABLE_SEATS: tuple = ('css selector', 'button.seat.ng-star-inserted')
CONFIRM_BUTTON: tuple = ('xpath', "//button[contains(@class, 'amount-summary_button') and .//span[contains(normalize-space(.), 'Cont')]]")
LOADER_C: tuple = ('xpath', "//*[contains(@class, 'page-loader') or contains(@class, 'loading') or contains(@class, 'loader')]")
PAX_TYPE: tuple = ('class name', 'paxtype_total_value')
continue_to_the_next_step()

Continues to the next step by clicking the “Continue” button.

This method waits until the “Continue” button is visible and clickable, then clicks on it. If the button is not found or clickable within the timeout period, a TimeoutException is raised.

load()

Load the page and wait for the page loader to disappear.

This method is used to load the page and wait until the page loader disappears. If the page loader does not disappear within the timeout period, a TimeoutException is raised.

select_seats_based_on_quantity_of_passengers()

Select seats based on passengers count.

select_seats_for_odd_passengers()

Select seats only for passengers in odd positions (1st, 3rd, 5th, etc.).
